trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Elizabeth City
There were no other sightings in Elizabeth City on or around October 8th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were on our deck looking at the beautiful blue sky when an object appeared from the south heading north. It was white, had a long triangular shape and absolutely no sound. We couldn't tell how high it was since we had never seen anything like it before my guess would be 10,000 to 20,000 ft. It moved smoothly and rapidly in a direct heading. I can't calculate the size of it because it seemed to be high in the sky. I can tell you right now that we watched this object and it left us both questioning what it could be.
